mapper.select:
SELECT BD.BOARD_CODE, BC.BOARD_CATEGORY, BD.BOARD_SEQ, BD.BOARD_TITLE, BD.BOARD_CONTENT, BD.BOARD_WRITER, BD.BOARD_DATE, BD.BOARD_COUNT, BD.BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD_DETAIL AS BD INNER JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY AS BC ON BD.BOARD_CODE = BC.BOARD_CODE
ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC;

SELECT BC.BOARD_CODE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD_DETAIL AS BD INNER JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY AS BC ON BD.BOARD_CODE = BC.BOARD_CODE WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_DETAIL (BOARD_CODE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (#{boardCode}, #{boardSeq}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, 0, NOW(), 0, #{boardContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_DETAIL SET BOARD_CODE=#{boardCode}, BOARD_TITLE=#{boardTitle}, BOARD_WRITER=#{boardWriter}, BOARD_CONTENT=#{boardContent} WHERE BOARD_SEQ=#{boardSeq}
